meanings.definition: An activity involving skill in making things by hand.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys creating crafts with her friends during art class.
meanings.sent2: The local fair had a variety of handmade crafts for sale.
meanings.sent3: His attempt at making a paper airplane turned into a hilarious crafts project.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a workshop where ideas were transformed into beautiful crafts.
meanings.sent5: The crafts on display at the museum were truly inspiring.

meanings.definition: Skill in carrying out one's work.
meanings.sent1: His craftsmanship in woodworking is admired by many.
meanings.sent2: The chef's crafts were evident in the exquisite presentation of the dish.
meanings.sent3: The cat showed great crafts in catching the elusive mouse.
meanings.sent4: Her patience and dedication were the crafts that led to her success.
meanings.sent5: The athlete's crafts on the field were unmatched by any opponent.
